item.title: Make great git diagrams
item.description: If you’re a developer, sooner or later you find yourself having to talk about git branching strategies. Drawing this up in a drawing tool can be very time consuming for most of us mere mortals. Luckily there is a great little javascript library that exists purely for making git branching diagrams.
